intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release of the unstable 1.3 release series. The 1.3 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0 and 1.2 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.3 release series will lead to the stable 1.4 release series in the next weeks, and newly added API can still change until that point.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided separately during the unstable 1.3 release series.

The versioning scheme that is used in general is that 1.x.y is API and ABI backwards compatible with previous 1.x.y releases. If x is an even number it is a stable release series and all releases in this series will only contain important bugfixes, e.g. the 1.0 series with 1.0.7. If x is odd it is a development release series that will lead to the next stable release series 1.x+1 and contains new features and bigger changes. During the development release series, new API can still change.

No perfectly groomed moustache or any amount of fine clothing is going to cover up the truth - these plugins are Bad with a capital B. They look fine on the outside, and might even appear to get the job done, but at the end of the day they're a black sheep. Without a golden-haired angel to watch over them, they'll probably land in an unmarked grave at the final showdown.

Don't bug us about their quality - exercise your Free Software rights, patch up the offender and send us the patch on the fastest steed you can steal from the Confederates. Because you see, in this world, there's two kinds of people, my friend: those with loaded guns and those who dig. You dig.

This module contains a set of plugins that aren't up to par compared to the rest. They might be close to being good quality, but they're missing something - be it a good code review, some documentation, a set of tests, a real live maintainer, or some actual wide use. If the blanks are filled in they might be upgraded to become part of either gst-plugins-good or gst-plugins-ugly, depending on the other factors. If the plugins break, you can't complain - instead, you can fix the problem and send us a patch, or bribe someone into fixing them for you. New contributors can start here for things to work on.

Other modules containing plugins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-good contains a set of well-supported plugins under our preferred license gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: dvbsrc: Uses deprecated field frontend type and add DVB S2/T2 support
Move VideoToolBox elements from applemedia to a different plugin
glimagesink fails with gst-sdk android tutorial-5 / tutorial-4
jpegparse: Does not passthrough timestamps depending on downstream elements
Add W64/R64 support
audiomixer: Need an element to do synchronized audio mixing
tsdemux: Handle PCR/PTS/DTS discont/gaps
mpegtsdemux / mpegtsmux: data flow error
h264parse: Parsing shifts timestamps between frames
mpegtsmux: add support for SDT and NIT tables for DVB-S/DVB-T
hlsdemux: potential dead-lock using GstTask
hlsdemux: No longer switches pads on playlist changes
mpegtsmux: improper timestamping of output packets
smoothstreaming: no audio with BBC bigbuckbunny stream
dashdemux: should not buffer the entire Period
gl: implement support for DispManX (Raspberry Pi)
Add EGLImage support (consume and provide buffer pool)
move GstEGLImageBufferPool and allocator from eglglessink to gstegl lib
liveadder: round when calculation length from duration
codecparsers: HEVC bitstream parser
codecparsers: Fix the quantization matrix scan order for h264
Message EISS and SCTE signaling sections on bus similar to PSI
Add openni2 plugin and openni2src element
Add avfvideosrc to the OS X build in applemedia
mpegts: Return GstMpegTsDescriptor in mpegts_get_descriptor_from_*
dvdspu: make palette change event sticky
curlsftpsink - new libcurl-based sink element for SFTP
geometrictransform: rotate: fix angle property help text
mpegts: fix uninitialized variable warnings
geometrictransform: Add a plugin for a 2D perspective transform
ivfparse: Port to 1.0
h264parse: Remove explicit PAR calculation and use the values provided by h264 codecparser
hlssink: doesn't have the sink flag set
vtenc: use proper release callback type in CVPixelBufferCreateWithPlanarBytes
eglglessink: remove unused functions in the eagl backend
Port cdaudio element to 1.
applemedia: coremediabuffer: use correct retain/release functions on CMSampleBufferRef buffer
avfvideosrc: set rank to GST_PRIMARY
curlftpsink: Create a temporary file during FTP transfer/upload
avfvideosrc: build failure
smoothstreaming: Better handling of multi audio tracks
d3dvideosink: force-aspect-ratio=false causes errors due to usage of uninitialised destination rectangle
mpegtsmux: Does not prevent plugging unparsed stream
dvbsuboverlay: fix reading of display window in display definition segment
srtp: add 256-bit keys support
mfcdec: doesn't work in odroid with kernel 3.8: dequeueing failed in input_dqbuf
shm: test_shm_sysmem_alloc unit test fails with timeout after some time
POTFILES.in is out of date
examples: tsparser: Add DVB teletext/subtitling parsing
assrender: handle video/x-raw(ANY) if downstream supports the GstVideoOverlayCompositionMeta API
schroenc: oggmux drops buffers from schroenc because of unset buffer offsets
h265parse: Fix segfault when parsing VPS
h265parser: fix a trivial overrun in a loop
tsdemux: fix memleak of PCROffsetCurrent
h265parse: update caps when receive VPS/SPS
tsdemux: Fix leak of PCROffsetGroup
applemedia: Fails to build on iOS: 'VideoToolbox/VideoToolbox.h' file not found
h265parser: Crashes on broken streams because of freeing uninitialized pointer
mpegtsmux: don't leak pad name when treating events
mxfdemux: don't use pull mode when the sequential scheduler flag is set
h264parse: Default framerate to 25/1 when no informations found
hlsdemux: Does not take into account stop time of seek events
applemedia: Fails to build on Mac OS X 10.7: 'VideoToolbox/VideoToolbox.h' file not found
mpegts: Some bugfixes regarding packetizing
mpegts: Unit test for library RFC
winks: configure test is broken - missing braces
winks: headers are not mentioned in Makefile.am
mpegts: parse extended event, component and content descriptors
mpegts: add terrestrial delivery system descriptor
shm: use shutdown() instead of close()
error: unknown type name 'gst_ks_clock'
curlsmtpsink: Timezone information is missed out in the sending out smtp email header
mpegts: Provide original binary data in the public API
mpegts: does not check data sizes when parsing descriptors
katedec: Katedec overwrites tags from oggdemux
tsparse: setting pipeline to PLAYING - > READY - > PLAYING is broken
dashdemux: live MPDs are immediately reloaded
dashdemux: attempts to fetch fragments before they're available.
mpegts: Add support for creation of SDT and service descriptor
debugutilsbad: fails gst-indent check
hlsdemux: null pointer deref if media playlist contains no media
add missed dvbsrc, mpegts docs
srtpenc: unref caps in sink query
change bandwidth to DVBv5-API
gst-plugins-bad: Ignore gcov intermediate files
tsdemux: Support DTS/DTS-HD bluray streams
wininetsrc: " iradio-mode " to default to TRUE
dvdspu: set proxy allocation flag on video sink pad
mpegvideoparse: Differentiate the mpeg-2 stream from mpeg-1 based on pic_ext also
frei0rfilter: memory corruption when the size of the incoming buffers change
sbcenc: Allow user to set channel-mode
watchdog: Add handling of paused state
dvbsuboverlay: handle video/x-raw(ANY) if downstream supports the GstVideoOverlayCompositionMeta API
fatal error: bcm_host.h: No such file or directory
W32: GL plugins can't be built in -bad
h264parser: should also expose a framerate in the case of interlaced samples
rfbsrc: doesn't send stream start event
mpegts: bugfix delivery system descriptor parsing
configure.ac: fix OSX host check
fatal error: GL/wglext.h: No such file or directory
mpegts: use g_slice_new0 and g_slice_free
mpegts: add data broadcast descriptor, stream indentifier descriptor
Decklinksrc won't initialize some models of capture cards (Patch included!)
mpegts: add dvb-t2 delivery system descriptor and typo fix
dashdemux: use correct print format for gint64
mpegts: add linkage, data_broadcast_id, private_data_specifier and parental_rating descriptors
mpegts: add atsc terrestrial virtual channel table
srtpdec: assertion when checking rtcp ssrc
mpegts: add frequency list, scrambling and dvb ca indentifier descriptor
directsoundsrc: CRITICAL, debug category not defined
glimagesink: shows only a black screen
camerabin: does not send an error if linking vfsrc pad to viewfinder queue fails
camerabin: allow " ANY " feature in viewfinderbin static pad templates
coremediabuffer: handle stride alignment
mxf: avoid dereferencing NULL pointer and leak fixes
liveadder: fix minor memory leak in caps query handler
smoothstreaming: using manifest before we have it in seeking query
avfvideosrc: check if downstream supports the video meta API
dvb: Protect against symbols added in DVB_API v5 minor version > 5
gl: No surface resizing logic on Android/iOS
glimagesink: fails to create window from gst-launch process if OS X terminal is fullscreen
glimagesink: swapped UV on OS X with avdec_h264
iosavassetsrc: port to 1.0
glimagesink: does not takes in account strides
glimagesink: expects a NSWindow instead of a NSView as the window handle
glimagesink: Deadlock on errors
GstGLMemory mix stride and width
GstGLBufferPool should avoid to allocate upload resources that are not going to be used for sure
glcolorscale: only black frames on GLESv2
y4mdec: Should check for VIDEO_META_API not CROP_META_API
Remove cdaudio
winks: Port to 1.0
